Question.Subject: How do you geo-tag a photo?
Question.Content: I have a photo from the top of the empire state building, NY and would like it to appear on google maps. How do i do this?
Question.ChosenAnswer: You need a device like Sony's GPS attachment when you take the photograph.

Answer.Content: You need a device like Sony's GPS attachment when you take the photograph.
Answer.Reference: GPS-CS3KA | GPS Image Tracker | Sony | Sony Style USA Map your memories with the ingenious GPS-CS3KA GPS image tracker, compatible with most Cyber-shot® digital still cameras and Handycam® camcorders. Record the time, date and location to each shot you take and enjoy them with the included Picture Motion ... Find related product support and help in Sony eSupport... 173k - 25 sec @ 56k www.sonystyle.com/webapp/wcs/stores/servlet/ProductDisp..
